title: How do i uninstall the League of Legends Screensaver app?
body:
I'm having a hard time uninstalling this file because every time I try to I get an error message saying that the file I'm trying to delete is open in another file or folder. 

Things I've done to try and counter this error message.

1)Disable my computer's screensaver function. 

2)Uninstall League of Legends Screensaver from my programs 

3)Open taskmanager and end anything that has to do with League of Legends. 

NONE of these have worked. 

How do I delete this League of Legends screensaver please?

replies.body: The screensaver process name is just 'service.exe', but it should have a League icon. If you're unable to find it or closing that doesn't work, you can always start your computer in Safe Mode and remove it, as Safe Mode will only start necessary processes.

I agree with DTN here, uninstalling [from a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7) would be a good idea. If that doesn't work, be sure you're running the uninstall executable from the LoL Screensaver folder [as admin](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104#wq3), or uninstall it [from the Windows side](http://www.bleepingcomputer.com/tutorials/uninstall-a-program-in-windows/).

Let me know if you have any questions.
